description: Numbers n such that n concatenated with n-1 is prime.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a054211 n = a054211_list !! (n-1)a054211_list = filter ((== 1) . a010051' . a127423) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 27 2015 Jul 15 2012
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Feb 15 2000.
